basics.name: Tallas Goo
basics.label: Student
basics.email: Email available upon request through LinkedIn
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in cybersecurity at the University of Hawaii at Manoa, and I expect to graduate in Spring 2021. I aim to commission as a Cyber Warfare Officer in the U.S. Air Force.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
education.area: Computer Science, Security Science Track (expected Spring, 2021)

volunteer.organization: Cru MK2MK Summer Missions - South Africa
volunteer.summary: Joined 50 other missionary kids in serving local communities in Port Shepstone, South Africa
highlights: Performed maintenance on several community centers

volunteer.summary: Developed leadership and outdoor skills while also performing community service projects
Represented the country of Romania in the 20th annual session of the Beijing Model United Nations
highlights: Debated real-life political issues in the General Assembly
Met students from high schools all over Asia
Drafted a resolution on nuclear disarmament from the perspective of Romania

awards.title: AFROTC Type 2 Scholarship

awards.summary: Cadets are awarded this scholarship based on factors such as physical fitness, GPA, leadership potential, and choice of major.
